00032 void eol_level_init()
00033 {
00034   cpInitChipmunk();
00035   eol_logger_message(
00036       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00037       "eol_level:initializing\n");
00038   _eol_level_manager = eol_resource_manager_init(
00039     "eol_level_manager",
00040     _eol_level_max,
00041     sizeof(eolLevel),
00042     eolTrue,
00043     eol_level_delete,
00044     eol_level_load_data_from_file
00045     );
00046   eol_logger_message(
00047       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00048       "eol_level:initialized\n");
00049   atexit(eol_level_close);
00050   _eol_level_initialized = eolTrue;
00051 
00052 }

00054 eolBool eol_level_initialized()
00055 {
00056   return _eol_level_initialized;

00059 void eol_level_config()
00060 {
00061   eolConfig *conf = NULL;
00062   _eol_level_max_layers = 3;
00063   _eol_level_max = 10;
00064   _eol_level_layer_draw_range = 1;
00065   _eol_level_draw_mode = eolLevelDrawFull;
00066   conf = eol_config_load("system/level.cfg");
00067   if (conf == NULL)return;
00068   eol_config_get_uint_by_tag(&_eol_level_draw_mode,conf,"drawLevel");
00069   eol_config_get_uint_by_tag(&_eol_level_layer_draw_range,conf,"drawDepth");
00070   eol_config_get_uint_by_tag(&_eol_level_clip_iterations ,conf,"iterations");
00071   eol_config_get_float_by_tag(&_eol_level_clip_step ,conf,"clipStep");
00072   eol_config_get_float_by_tag(&_eol_level_clip_thickness ,conf,"clipThickness");
00073   eol_config_get_float_by_tag(&_eol_level_slop,conf,"clipSlop");
00074   eol_config_get_float_by_tag(&_eol_level_bias,conf,"clipBias");
00075   
00076 }

00088 void eol_level_clear()
00089 {
00090   if (!eol_level_initialized())
00091   {
00092     eol_logger_message(
00093         EOL_LOG_INFO,
00094         "eol_level:cannot clean, not initialized\n");
00095     return;
00096   }
00097   if (!_eol_level_manager)return;
00098   eol_resource_manager_clean(_eol_level_manager);
00099 
00100 }
00101 
00102 void eol_level_close()
00103 {
00104   eol_logger_message(
00105       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00106       "eol_level:closing\n"
00107   );
00108   eol_resource_manager_free(&_eol_level_manager);
00109   _eol_level_max = 0;
00110   _eol_level_max_layers = 1;
00111   _eol_level_initialized = eolFalse;
00112   eol_logger_message(
00113       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00114       "eol_level:closed\n"
00115   );
00116 }

00118 void eol_level_free(eolLevel **level)
00119 {
00120   if (!eol_level_initialized())return;
00121   if (_eol_level_current == *level)
00122   {
00123     _eol_level_current = NULL;
00124   }
00125   eol_resource_free_element(_eol_level_manager,(void **)level);
00126 }

00128 void eol_level_delete_layer(eolLevelLayer * level)
00129 {
00130   eolBackground *b = NULL;
00131   GList *s,*e;
00132   if (!level)return;
00133 
00134   /*TODO: free tile set*/
00135   eol_mesh_free(&level->clipMesh);
00136   
00137   if (level->tileMap.map != NULL)free(level->tileMap.map);
00138   
00139   for (s = level->spawnList; s != NULL; s = s->next)
00140   {
00141     eol_spawn_free((eolSpawn *)s->data);
00142   }
00143   s = NULL;
00144   g_list_free(level->spawnList);
00145   for (s = level->backgrounds; s != NULL; s = s->next)
00146   {
00147     if (s->data == NULL)continue;
00148     b = (eolBackground *)s->data;
00149     eol_model_free(&b->model);
00150     free(b);
00151   }
00152   s = NULL;
00153   g_list_free(level->backgrounds);
00154 
00155   for (e = level->entities;e != NULL;e = e->next)
00156   {
00157     eol_entity_remove_from_space(e->data);
00158   }
00159   g_list_free(level->entities);/*just free our pointers to em, they can delete themselves*/
00160   if (level->space != NULL)cpSpaceFree(level->space);
00161 }
00162 
00163 void eol_level_delete(void *data)
00164 {
00165   eolLevel *level;
00166   GList *l = NULL;
00167   if (!data)return;
00168   level = (eolLevel *)data;
00169   for (l = level->layers; l != NULL;l = l->next)
00170   {
00171     eol_level_delete_layer(l->data);
00172   }
00173   g_list_free(level->layers);
00174   memset(level,0,sizeof(eolLevel));
00175 }

00178 {
00179   return eolTrue;

00182 eolLevelLayer *eol_level_add_layer(eolLevel *level)
00183 {
00184   eolLevelLayer *layer = NULL;
00185   if (!level)return NULL;
00186   layer = (eolLevelLayer*)malloc(sizeof(eolLevelLayer));
00187   if (layer == NULL)
00188   {
00189     eol_logger_message(
00190       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00191       "eol_level:failed to allocated a layer for level %s\n",
00192       level->idName);
00193     return NULL;
00194   }
00195   memset(layer,0,sizeof(eolLevelLayer));
00196 
00197   layer->space = cpSpaceNew();
00198   if (layer->space == NULL)
00199   {
00200     eol_logger_message(
00201       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00202       "Unable to create a physics space for new layer in level %s!\n",
00203       level->idName);
00204     eol_level_delete_layer(layer);
00205     return NULL;
00206   }
00207   layer->space->iterations = _eol_level_clip_iterations;
00208   layer->space->sleepTimeThreshold = 999999;
00209   cpSpaceSetEnableContactGraph(layer->space,eolTrue);
00210   cpSpaceSetCollisionSlop(layer->space, _eol_level_slop);
00211   cpSpaceSetCollisionBias(layer->space, _eol_level_bias);
00212   
00213   level->layers = g_list_append(level->layers,layer);
00214   level->layerCount++;
00215   return layer;
00216 }
00217 
00218 eolBackground *eol_level_add_background_to_layer(eolLevelLayer *layer)
00219 {
00220   eolBackground *back;
00221   if (!layer)return NULL;
00222   back = (eolBackground*)malloc(sizeof(eolBackground));
00223   if (back == NULL)
00224   {
00225     eol_logger_message(
00226       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00227       "eol_level:failed to allocated a background for layer %s\n",
00228       layer->idName);
00229     return NULL;
00230   }
00231   layer->backgrounds = g_list_append(layer->backgrounds,back);
00232   return back;
00233 }
00234 
00235 eolLevel *eol_level_new()
00236 {
00237   eolLevel *level = NULL;
00238   if (!eol_level_initialized())
00239   {
00240     eol_logger_message(
00241       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00242       "eol_entdow:used uninitialized\n");
00243     return NULL;
00244   }
00245   level = (eolLevel *)eol_resource_new_element(_eol_level_manager);
00246   if (level == NULL)
00247   {
00248     eol_logger_message(
00249       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00250       "eol_level:failed to get new resource\n");
00251     return NULL;
00252   }
00253   return level;
00254 }

00260 void eol_level_draw_current()
00261 {
00262   if (!eol_level_initialized())return;
00263   if (_eol_level_current == NULL)return;
00264   switch (_eol_level_draw_mode)
00265   {
00266     case eolLevelDrawFull:
00267       eol_level_draw(_eol_level_current);
00268       break;
00269     case eolLevelDrawClip:
00270       eol_level_draw_clip(_eol_level_current);
00271       break;
00272   }
00273 }
00274 
00275 void eol_level_draw_background(eolBackground * back)
00276 {
00277   if (!back)return;
00278   if (!back->model)return;
00279   eol_model_draw(
00280     back->model,
00281     back->ori.position,
00282     back->ori.rotation,
00283     back->ori.scale,
00284     back->ori.color,
00285     back->ori.alpha,
00286     0
00287   );
00288 }
00289 
00290 void eol_level_draw_layer_backgrounds(eolLevelLayer *layer)
00291 {
00292   GList *b;
00293   if (!layer)return;
00294   for (b = layer->backgrounds; b != NULL; b= b->next)
00295   {
00296     eol_level_draw_background((eolBackground *)b->data);
00297   }
00298 }

00301 {
00302   if (!layer)return;
00303   eol_mesh_draw_wire(
00304     layer->clipMesh,
00305     layer->clipMaskOri.position,
00306     layer->clipMaskOri.rotation,
00307     layer->clipMaskOri.scale,
00308     layer->clipMaskOri.color,
00309     layer->clipMaskOri.alpha
00310   );
00311 
00312 }

00314 void eol_level_draw_layer_bounds(eolLevelLayer *layer)
00315 {
00316   eolOrientation ori;
00317   if (!layer)return;
00318   eol_orientation_clear(&ori);
00319   eol_draw_rect_3D(layer->bounds,ori);
00320 }
00321 
00322 void eol_level_draw(eolLevel *level)
00323 {
00324   int i;
00325   GList *layerNode = NULL;
00326   eolLevelLayer *layer = NULL;
00327   float alpha = 1;
00328   if (!level)return;
00329   if (!level->layers)return;
00330   i = level->active - _eol_level_layer_draw_range;
00331   if (i < 0)i = 0;
00332   layerNode = g_list_nth(level->layers,i);
00333   for (;(layerNode != NULL) && (i < level->active + _eol_level_layer_draw_range);
00334         layerNode = layerNode->next,i++)
00335   {
00336     if (layerNode->data == NULL)continue;
00337     if (i >= level->active)alpha = 0.25;
00338     layer = (eolLevelLayer *)layerNode->data;
00339     layer->alpha = alpha;
00340     eol_level_draw_layer_backgrounds(layer);
00341   }
00342 }
00343 
00344 void eol_level_draw_clip(eolLevel *level)
00345 {
00346   eolLevelLayer *layer;
00347   if (!level)return;
00348   if (!level->layers)return;
00349   layer = g_list_nth_data(level->layers,level->active);
00350   if (layer == NULL)
00351   {
00352     eol_logger_message(
00353       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00354       "cannot get layer %n for level %s\n",
00355       level->active,
00356       level->idName);
00357     return;
00358   }
00359   eol_level_draw_layer_bounds(layer);
00360   eol_level_draw_layer_clipmask(layer);
00361 }
00362 
00363 void eol_level_set_active_layer(eolLevel *level, eolUint layer)
00364 {
00365   if (!level)return;
00366   if (!level->layers)return;
00367   if (layer >= level->layerCount)
00368   {
00369     eol_logger_message(
00370       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00371       "eol_level:cannot set active layer %i for level %s\n",
00372       layer,
00373       level->idName);
00374     return;
00375   }
00376   level->active = layer;
00377 }
00378 
00379 void eol_level_set_current_level(eolLevel *level)
00380 {
00381   if (!level)return;
00382   if (!level->layers)return;
00383   _eol_level_current = level;
00384 }

00390 cpBody *eol_level_get_active_layer_body()
00391 {
00392   eolLevelLayer *layer;
00393   if (!_eol_level_current)return NULL;
00394   layer = g_list_nth_data(_eol_level_current->layers,_eol_level_current->active);
00395   if (!layer)return NULL;
00396   return cpSpaceGetStaticBody(layer->space);
00397 }
00398 
00399 cpShape *eol_level_add_segment_to_space(eolFloat sx,
00400                                         eolFloat sy,
00401                                         eolFloat ex,
00402                                         eolFloat ey,
00403                                         cpSpace *space)
00404 {
00405   cpShape *shape;
00406   float friction = 0.1;
00407   if(space == NULL)return NULL;
00408   shape = cpSegmentShapeNew(cpSpaceGetStaticBody(space), cpv(sx,sy), cpv(ex,ey), _eol_level_clip_thickness);
00409   if (sx == ex)
00410   {
00411     friction = 0;
00412   }
00413   if(shape != NULL)
00414   {
00415     shape->e = 0;
00416     shape->u = friction;
00417     shape->collision_type = eolEntityClipLevel;
00418     cpShapeSetLayers (shape, eolEntityClipLevel);
00419     cpSpaceAddShape(space, shape);
00420   }
00421   return shape;
00422 }
00423 
00424 void eol_level_add_triangle_to_space(cpSpace *space,eolFace *face,eolMesh *mask)
00425 {
00426   if ((!space)||(!face)||(!mask))return;
00427   /*TODO dont add duplicate edges to the space*/
00428   eol_level_add_segment_to_space(mask->_vertices[face->vertices[0]].x,
00429                                  mask->_vertices[face->vertices[0]].y,
00430                                  mask->_vertices[face->vertices[1]].x,
00431                                  mask->_vertices[face->vertices[1]].y,
00432                                  space);
00433 
00434   eol_level_add_segment_to_space(mask->_vertices[face->vertices[1]].x,
00435                                  mask->_vertices[face->vertices[1]].y,
00436                                  mask->_vertices[face->vertices[2]].x,
00437                                  mask->_vertices[face->vertices[2]].y,
00438                                  space);
00439 
00440   eol_level_add_segment_to_space(mask->_vertices[face->vertices[2]].x,
00441                                  mask->_vertices[face->vertices[2]].y,
00442                                  mask->_vertices[face->vertices[1]].x,
00443                                  mask->_vertices[face->vertices[1]].y,
00444                                  space);
00445   /*TODO see if I need to catch these and free em up later.*/
00446 }
00447 
00448 void eol_level_add_mask_to_space(eolLevelLayer *layer)
00449 {
00450   int i;
00451   if (!layer)return;
00452   if ((!layer->space)||(!layer->clipMesh))
00453   {
00454     eol_logger_message(
00455       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00456       "cannot add clipmesh to space %s: missing data\n",
00457       layer->idName);
00458     return;
00459   }
00460   for (i = 0; i < layer->clipMesh->_numFaces;i++)
00461   {
00462     eol_level_add_triangle_to_space(layer->space,
00463                                     &layer->clipMesh->_faces[i],
00464                                     layer->clipMesh);
00465   }
00466 }

00468 void eol_level_update_active()
00469 {
00470   eol_level_update(_eol_level_current);
00471 }
00472 
00473 void eol_level_update(eolLevel *level)
00474 {
00475   eolLevelLayer *layer = NULL;
00476   if (!level)return;
00477   layer = g_list_nth_data(level->layers,level->active);
00478   if (layer == NULL)return;
00479   /*presync*/
00480   eol_entity_presync_all();
00481 
00482   cpSpaceStep(layer->space,_eol_level_clip_step);
00483 
00484   /*post sync*/
00485   eol_entity_postsync_all();
00486 }
00487 
00488 void eol_level_add_entity_to_active_layer(eolEntity *ent)
00489 {
00490   if (!_eol_level_current)return;
00491   eol_level_add_entity_to_layer(g_list_nth_data(_eol_level_current->layers,
00492                                                 _eol_level_current->active),
00493                                 ent);
00494 }
00495 
00496 void eol_level_add_entity_to_layer(eolLevelLayer *layer, eolEntity *ent)
00497 {
00498   if ((!layer) || (!ent))return;
00499   eol_entity_add_to_space(ent,layer->space);
00500   if (ent->_space != layer->space)return;
00501   layer->entities = g_list_append(layer->entities,ent);
00502 }
00503 
00504 void eol_level_remove_entity_from_layer(eolLevelLayer *layer, eolEntity *ent)
00505 {
00506   if ((!layer) || (!ent))return;
00507   layer->entities = g_list_remove(layer->entities,ent);
00508   eol_entity_remove_from_space(ent);
00509 }
00510 
00511 void eol_level_remove_entity_from_active_layer(eolEntity *ent)
00512 {
00513   if (!_eol_level_current)return;
00514   eol_level_remove_entity_from_layer(g_list_nth_data(_eol_level_current->layers,
00515                                                      _eol_level_current->active),
00516                                      ent);
00517 }
